org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.title: Debian
org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.content: <div><p>On <b>Debian Squeeze (6.0)</b>, add the following to your <i>/etc/apt/sources.list</i>:</p></div><div><pre>deb http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/midgardproject:/ratatoskr/Debian_6.0/ ./</pre></div><div><p>Then run <i>apt-get update</i> and <i>apt-get install libmidgard2-2010</i>. To use Midgard2 with GObject Introspection in any language, install the library with <i>apt-get install gir1.0-midgard2</i>. For PHP, install the extension via <i>apt-get install php5-midgard2</i>.</p></div><div><p>On <b>Debian Wheezy</b> Midgard2 <a href="http://packages.debian.org/search?keywords=midgard&amp;searchon=names&amp;suite=testing&amp;section=all">is available</a> in the repositories. Simply run:</p></div><div><pre>$ sudo apt-get install libmidgard2</pre></div><div><p>To use Midgard2 with GObject Introspection in any language, install the library with apt-get install <i>gir1.0-midgard2</i>. For PHP, install the extension via <i>apt-get install php5-midgard2</i>.</p></div>
